content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LLTCD
      operator: is_contained_by
      value:
        - MedDRA lowest level code
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0378
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --LLTCD  is not a valid MedDRA lowest level code
Outcome:
  Message: --LLTCD  is not a valid MedDRA lowest level code
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0378
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The lowest-level term code assigned to the event from
                  MedDRA.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --LLTCD
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE
      - MH
      - CE

json.Description: Trigger error when --LLTCD  is not a valid MedDRA lowest level code

Outcome.Message: --LLTCD  is not a valid MedDRA lowest level code

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The lowest-level term code assigned to the event from MedDRA.
